website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EOS Rebel T6 (aka the EOS 1300D) hits the basics for a low price, but that's about it.
pros: The Canon EOS Rebel T6's photo and video quality are definitely better than those of a point-and-shoot
cons: Its feature set is beyond minimal and it's slow for a family camera

customer_reviews.title: There is no way to change the ISO
customer_reviews.text: The ratings on this camera say that the ISO goes up very high, which is true. However, what they don't tell you is that the ISO is Automatic and there is no way to set it yourself in Manuel Mode. You can change the aperture and Shutter speed but it will automatically choose your ISO. Not a fan of that! Besides that the came is very user friendly and the wifi works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Only Two Small Inconveniences
customer_reviews.text: The Canon EOS Rebel T6 is a great started DSLR, I've owned it for about a year and only have two complaints. First of all I wish the screen would flip out. It does not flip out or move at all but If you're fine with a fixed screen this is in my opinion is a great entry level DSLR. The only other problem I have with this camera is that there is no microphone jack. I bought the "videomic go" from Rode without thinking about it and when I went to put it on my camera I was super disappointed that there wasn't a mic jack. Other than those two minor inconveniences I love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Barker

customer_reviews.title: Smile
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I haven't taken pictures in a while. I have a 35mm Canon AE-1 camera that I've been using since the early 80's. I use digital but mostly with an IPhone. This is my big move to DSLR. The price was reasonable, due to the fact that the T6 is mostly plastic. There is a lot to get familiar with but having fun in the process. Good deal, good buy. Getting back into an old hobby. Loving it
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good option for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great option for beginners. Takes excellent pictures and like most DSLR cameras, it gives a lot of room for editing and post-processing (just make sure you're shooting in raw, not jpeg). Would recommend getting a prime lens to go with this if on a tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: Lawliet L.

customer_reviews.title: Product looks used
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package I see this product is used and I felt like returning it back but I need it for my vacation. Lenses is not properly covered with bubble wrap. The worst part is the neck band is also missing some rubber lockers.
customer_reviews.author: Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Great pro camera for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can use the camera connect app to operate the camera and view photos on my phone instantly. Took a few tries to figure it out, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a novice photographer
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son, who has had an interest in learning more about photography. He really likes the different options on this camera, as well as the WiFI capability. There are lots of special effects and settings to try out, and since it's digital, if it doesn't work, it's easy to delete and try again. He thought he wanted an old school 35mm, but now he says he's glad he has a digital instead.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: What a camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new T6 - it's everything I've ever wanted. The body weight is just right to where I can have it dangling around my neck all day and my neck isn't sore. The details it picks up is incredible! My black pug is very difficult to photograph but this camera is able to do it with ease! I love it and highly recommend it's a purchase you won't regret!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: It is a good camera to start in the world of photography
customer_reviews.text: It is a good camera to start in the world of photography. It is not a good camera to start vlogging. The video autofocus is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroshi Yague

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: 100% in love with this camera. It is perfect for beginners and professionals. Amazing photos at long distances and close up.
customer_reviews.author: Lobsang

customer_reviews.title: Even getting great shots of the moon
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it constantly. Even getting great shots of the moon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Prince

customer_reviews.title: Cannon is a very nice camera, this camera has exceeded all expectations
customer_reviews.text: Cannon is a very nice camera, this camera has exceeded all expectations! It takes the best pictures and love the lens it comes with!
customer_reviews.author: cristi

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 5 star review based on how well it functions in relation to how much I paid for it. Is it the best camera in the world... No of course not but it's a damn good point and shoot, the images are crisp and clean, the cannon interface is a cannon interface and I found it very easy to pair with my phone which is great for instagram. I have worked in photography and have used top of the line cameras and while this is not as good as those, it's a fraction of the cost and I wouldn't be to butthurt if I dropped it on the go. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: low quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: this camera's pictures are really not worth it... For the same price you can get a new phone with all the extra functionality and pics just as good
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: An excellent camera for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera for beginners wanting to learn DSLR cameras. It provides automation that also allows for beginners to take photographs easily. This deal provides two lens both of which highly useful for photographs close in and far away. There is also the ability to add various Canon lens to extend that types of photos that can be taken. So this is a package that can grow with your abilities. I am well pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Love my Canon Rebel T6! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Canon Rebel T6! I’ve had a T3 and love it, but it was time to upgrade. Haven’t tried the WiFi yet. I take action shots for college baseball my wine is one and the American Legion Baseball program in our hometown as the secretary for the program. This camera is perfect to capture what I need. Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good picture quality, good beginner camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter-in-law for Christmas and she loves it. She figured out how to use it quickly and rarely had to refer to the directions. She said it was the best gift she had ever received.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Butler

customer_reviews.title: Canon EOS camera
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. I bought this for my son and he has used it a bunch. Like that it came with the two lenses as that allows for a variety of photo opportunities. It appears to be very well constructed and we're still learning about all the features. Really like this camera. The packaging was well done and the shipment arrived in just a few days. Nice piece of equipment and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easily one of best cameras to get started with DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great. WiFi connectivity is great, simple and advanced options are really good. Lenses are ok, probably good enough for entry level (all photos have come out better than expected). Was even able to use old lenses from Rebel SLR with ease. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LROD from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for hobbyist
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my oldest to take on photography. He really likes the camera, I would say this camera is not beginner but not advanced somewhere in the middle. Pictures come out really nice. This does not come with an SD card so ensure you buy an SD card and fully charge the battery before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Filter

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really great camera all around, especially for beginners. I definitely recommend buying this camera, it’s easy to use and takes amazing shots. just so you get a clear understanding of the quality, there will be photos below
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Miles

customer_reviews.title: Nice intermediate camera
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from an older, non-SLR Canon Rebel and I take a lot of youth soccer photos, but nothing professional. I found EOS Rebel T6 to be a nice step up from my previous model. I don't have to learn anything new and didn't have to shell out big bucks. It's perfect for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Mason

customer_reviews.title: Imposes patience and consious effort
customer_reviews.text: Went back to an SLR for control of light, shutter speed and optimum framing.....spoiled by automatic cameras that do it all in a smaller, lighter package. Even in auto mode must make several adjustments and hold up heavy camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holtaway

customer_reviews.title: Great starter camera
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera to take on our 30 year class trip. It has been a great camera for us. My wife and I are beginners in photography and from the reviews we read, this looked like the right camera for us. The kit came with everything we needed to get started. I would recommend purchasing another battery.
customer_reviews.author: Cletus31

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Overall good camera as my first dSLR ever. I ended up also buying a set of lend filters and close-up lenses since I like to do floral shots and photos of insects. Only complaint is that the case it comes with is better suited for when the shorter lend us mounted, unless you take everything else out of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Kyllo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son a year ago for his 18th birthday...he has loved it since day one! The picture quality is beautiful and he learned this camera very fast! This was his first true camera that wasn’t a point and shoot. For the price, this is an excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: Honeybee

customer_reviews.title: My new love
customer_reviews.text: I decided to take up photography, so I thought why not get a good camera. After a few research I decided to go with this one and after 4 months, I am loving it. I have taken some really good photos, but now I am ready to add lenses hahahaha
customer_reviews.author: Tweety05

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband needed for his new camera! He was surprised and delighted. It came so quickly and was exactly as described. He is learning how to use it - and looking forward to posting his fishing pictures! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Suz in Wenatchee

customer_reviews.title: USED, REFURBISHED MERCHANDISE
customer_reviews.text: Item came dirty, used, without any of the original packaging or documentation/user manual/etc. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Non

customer_reviews.title: Camera Body is HUGE !
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like the product, as the camera body is to large for my intended uses on property inspections. Probably better for men with larger hands. I can barely hold in one hand. Since it was a great Black Friday deal, I will keep it, and learn to use for scenery shots, especially my favorite Sunsets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: You get what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: You get for what you pay for. Pretty disappointed. Beginner friendly though. Auto focus sucks. UPDATE: it actually works pretty good. You really just have to play with camera figure it out. Be patient. So I moved it up to 4 stars. It doesn’t get 5 because quality of photo isn’t that good. My iPhone 11 captures better images
customer_reviews.author: Cinn

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made this year!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera, I love both lenses, they are easy for me as I am a beginner enthusiast. I need more time in the manual to figure out all the features but I’m impressed and very happy so far, so it can only get better from here!
customer_reviews.author: Alannah Michalski

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Canon is a trusted company who delivery magnificent products for all kind the consumers. The T6 is a great camera at affordable price to learn photography with extraordinary results.
customer_reviews.author: Didimio Rios

customer_reviews.title: I like this one much better
customer_reviews.text: My First DSLR, been using a Nikonos 35mm for years, I like this one much better, it's more demanding on batteries but not having to chase film containers makes up for that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Smile
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I bought it to take better pictures of my aquariums initially but I also use it outside, take picture of nature and my dogs. Glad I bought. Still learning to use it better.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wiggles2013

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and takes great pictures
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her camera. It is easy to use and takes great pictures. She is a beginner and will continue to be able to grow into this camera learning what all the feature can do.
customer_reviews.author: CCS

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera! Love everything about it! i needed a new camera for my family to take pictures on trips and or just for the holidays this is a great camera i don't know much but you tube is your friend when it comes to learning. pictures come out wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: N. Lainez

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed I can't even get to connect the camera to the phone anymore for some reason
customer_reviews.author: Sheyla Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time camera buyer/user and I absolutely love my Cannon T6. I did a lot of homework before buying and this was the brand and model that most appealed to me. It lived up to my expectations. The neck strap is not too comfortable but that's easily solved by changing it to maybe a cross body one like I did. The cam itself is very very good.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera before, but it got lost in one of my moves. We ordered this one for an upcoming trip, and it's exactly what I remember. Shipping was fast and the product came in undamaged and in the original packaging. Would recommend for new photography enthusiast that are looking to take great photos with good user friendly features at a great entry price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son because he wants to get into photography. Got here on time. He loves it. It's a good thing cameras are digital now or else he would have made us go broke on film because he's taken so many pics.
customer_reviews.author: kimandtrav

customer_reviews.title: Great quality camera
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly a great quality camera for beginners with DSLRs. I learned how to use it super easily and the picture quality is great!! The app however is pretty crappy. Crashes too much so I'd recommend buying a cable to hook it up to your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Alexander

customer_reviews.title: A microphone can’t be plugged in but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.text: Great all around camera. Remember you can’t plug in a microphone of any kind in this one. The natural sound isn’t too bad. However, you’d need software like adobe to clear up the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lole

customer_reviews.title: Their techs are U.S. experts. No lost time with unintelligble, unscroupoulus foreign techs
customer_reviews.text: Their U.S. tech support is far superior to what most of our companies are using. The foreign tech support we usually get is unpatriotic and endangers our national security.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Smith

customer_reviews.title: look for packaged deals
customer_reviews.text: The camera, so far so good. Right after I get it and start using it, I see the package deals being offered. I could have got a lot more for not much more money. Tripod, filters more lens wow. I know I can return it and all that, but I will look closer at all packaged deals in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera for individuals who are looking to get into photography. The camera allows for a lot of learning to occur with the user and has an easy to use interface.
customer_reviews.author: mark a gersten

customer_reviews.title: T6 cannon camera
customer_reviews.text: A lot of different functions will pull out great photos! Super happy to have this camera, I'm gonna take it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I nost say this most be one of the best things i have ever bought. Very easy to use. I find myself taking lots more pictures again then i have in the past even then i did with my cellphone. I know its got one more thing to have to bring with you but when you see the pictures it takes makes it worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: scott petrosky

customer_reviews.title: a great value and pack
customer_reviews.text: a great value and pack. very happy with this purchase. i had another canon rebel before this, but it didn't have the wi-fi connectivity. that connectivity has made me open up to so many new angles for photography and i'm really happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Ily Tran

customer_reviews.title: Greater MB/pixels
customer_reviews.text: I like the data improvement from my last camera. I went from 1-3 MB to about 20-25MB. I plan to use the improved pixels to improve my art images for online sales and in applying to art contests. I haven’t used all of it’s features yet. I’m mostly using auto mode and a few of the manual modes, when I have time to think about the lighting, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: It was okay camera look great but it came without a box, no instructions no SD card. And it was dead. I don't even know how to charge the camera. Was such a waste of money, would rather by it new so I can get everything it came with plus more. Stick with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Have not been able to get this to work yet.
customer_reviews.text: DSLR is new to me, but I can't seem to get started with this camera. Even on the automatic setting nothing seems to show up. Waiting for some help with making it work
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: As far as I'm concerned, this is by far much more than a beginner's camera. With the double zoom lens included, this is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Dandee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: GREAT camera... but! It does not have any mic input. You would have to record on a different device and sinchronize during editing - unless the built on mic is good enough for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Falla

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a hobbiest
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for Christmas, and he loves it. It has enough whistles and bells to take great pictures, but isn't so complicated that it is scary. He loves the wi-fi connection!
customer_reviews.author: cheyute

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Great pics, simple to use on auto, yet has many manual mode features. It does not have a touch screen which would have been handy though.
customer_reviews.author: Farley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take great pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my wife for Christmas. Started using immediately with excellent pictures in auto. Now she wants to take photography class. Easy setup for Wi-Fi and Bluetooth even as a novice. Nice start up kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I made the right choice
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous package. Camera is excellent and easy to use. FAST. Great pictures. Switching lenses is a breeze. Padded case is great size. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MarvBoy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this camera bundle. The photos are amazing... the auto focus is a tad bit annoying, it makes a sound every time it focuses on something but it’s not a huge deal to me. I still love it. It’s perfect for beginners wanting to get into photography. The videos are also very good. Overall would recommend. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudelis Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Wy wife who is a freelance writer got a gig that requires her to include photos with her text. She's only used a point a shoot and takes awful pictures. Using the presets on the Canon, she can take passable pictures that are good enough to be published. I don't know how many great photos it will produce, but it's the right tool for the job.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It came in new packaging and was exactly what I expected. Was a gift for my 16 year old and she loves it. Awesome beginners camera. Great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: John Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Best DSLR I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best DSLR I've ever owned! Easy to use! Excellent for video production! Easy lens change out! PRO Stuff for a decent price! Would prefer a 3.5 mm mic port. Great for family portraits, weddings, EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, no damage, nothing. I absolutely love this camera! Perfect for my photography class. I hadn't read that it came with a strap so I bought one separately, but you DON'T NEED A STRAP, IT COMES WITH ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Buy or not to buy....
customer_reviews.text: If you are not an expert photographer or have a lot of time to educate yourself, this camera is not for you. I kept thinking I would get the time to learn how to use and I missed the return date! Now I'm stuck with it. It would make beautiful pictures if you have time to learn to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this camera! Great picture quality and love the fact that you can download an app on your phone and upload the picture from you camera directly to you phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a T6, Received a T7i
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a T6 and received a T7i- quite the mini upgrade and was pleased with my purchase. I use these cameras as back-ups for my wedding videography business and they're nifty cameras for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Estelle

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Andrew will love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The rush delivery was fantastic!!!! All of you are awesome!!!! He took a photography class and is anxious!!!! Ron R
customer_reviews.author: Ron R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Photography
customer_reviews.text: It was a special gift. And it works wonderfully. Great for Her first real professional type camera
customer_reviews.author: Paul e. turner

customer_reviews.title: Got this for YouTube Music
customer_reviews.text: I do the sound for my sis in law and husbands music. Got this for better video. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Great starter Pro camera
customer_reviews.text: Great great starter camera pictures come out beautifully and love the add ons you can buy for this camera . Wifi and app for phone is the best feature
customer_reviews.author: shayne lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I liked because it is a good beginner camera, it is like a professional and this photos are beautiful, its is easy to use and we obtain excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: Donaldo Lopez Pizarro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality! I was very impressed by this camera. very good to make my youtube videos and so simple to use. I used a YONGNUO lens with it and its great.
customer_reviews.author: Lina River

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy on Amazon, go to a real camera store!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically wanted to purchase a brand new camera and received a refurbished camera. Sodisappointed. After a few photos the mirror stopped working. I'm returning and probably going to go with a different brand. Camera feels cheap as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Rae Neveau

customer_reviews.title: I have ben using CANON cameras for 4+ decades as a photojournalist/professional photographer.
customer_reviews.text: Decided it was time to make a break from the darkroom for most of my work and finally got into digital about 4 years ago. As a long time user of CANON products I knew that I would stay loyal to the brand. I have F-1s, A-1s, AE-1s and even an ELPH for pocket carry daily. Can't beat them! (Still have a stable of others up to and including an old Graphfex 4x5)
customer_reviews.author: Rhode Island bound

customer_reviews.title: awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! great quality! just like to picture! easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes great quality pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for a photo booth. Takes excellent pictures, but has troubles with auto focus in darker environments.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: even if you have been taking pictures for years this is a great camera
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer music

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this camera. So fun to play around with and get some amazing shots!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price !!
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, easy to maneuver and great value for the money !!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Casares

customer_reviews.title: My first DSLR camera and it seems like it is worth for the price
customer_reviews.text: My first DSLR camera and it seems like it is worth for the price. Very simple to use without compromising the quality of the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit with two good lenses for the price. I have mainly used the camera for nature photography and the larger lens allows great zoom for capturing wildlife from far. Image quality is very clear and with some nice Lightroom effects, you can get very professional pictures after your first shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Overman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent first DSLR for 2016
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera, and good replacement for T3/T4.. However, I would recommend adding new lense to the kit, not staying with the default, and older lenses could have some focus issues on the T6.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lyublinski

customer_reviews.title: Good starter camera
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a beginners camera but I believe if you do your research and for the newer models that have came out there’s better offers but it’s well built and does what it can
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fuell

customer_reviews.title: Canon changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I didn't know what I was missing and this camera is amazing to say the least! I take it with me everywhere I go. If you like taking pictures them get this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Bigrob808

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 15 year old granddaughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. You can really do a lot with the two lenses. Plus, the camerA can be as simple as putting it on automatic and pushing the button or you can individualize the settings to customize the shot.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Serafini

customer_reviews.title: Beginner
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner so I cannot rate it properly. It has done everything I want well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with dead battery seller replace battery in the key camera does not work at all goes back to functions in in menu and one camera button pushed take several pictures and flash goes off at the same time and screen flashes two will not take pictures or not work does not function
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every Picture Tells A Story
customer_reviews.text: Nice buy for the price. Easier thank last camera (Nikon). Good interface with my laptop (Mac)
customer_reviews.author: Dave Jay

customer_reviews.title: The best !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new canon t6 camera:) it my first one I own in what can I say I love it, the picture look amazing
customer_reviews.author: marcos

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and a Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied with the product and the seller. Got her in 2 days even though it said it might be a couple of weeks. Totally brand new in the box. Happy happy!
customer_reviews.author: MW Miller

customer_reviews.title: My wife is very pleased and happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely thankful I went with this (directly from Canon) instead of a larger package with more accessories. My wife is very pleased and happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Seales

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is pretty good but not as good as i was hoping for. The settings are a little complicated but all in all at this price point its pretty much worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Consecaso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this cam and it works very well once you get use to it. Photo quality is EXCELLENT I will be using this mostly for Still photography in monochrome The video auto-focus is garbage
customer_reviews.author: FREDERICK

customer_reviews.title: This was given as a gift to my adult daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift to my adult daughter. She's now taking a class to learn to use it to its fullest potential, but appreciates the quality and general ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Elephagreen

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Had a Canon EOS Rebel T5 I gave to my oldest son, and he loves it. I was going through a gadget withdrawal, and this is an AWESOME kit at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Rex l. Richberger

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: If someone is looking to get started with photography or wants to start up and learn this is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and room to grow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend who has always wanted a nice camera and it was definitely a great purchase. Takes great pictures on automatic and as we have started exploring the manual settings we have really started to see what this camera can do.
customer_reviews.author: Forenzikz

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cameras
customer_reviews.text: Very professional and great pictures. The only downside is that it only holds up to 12 minutes of video and then you have to start recording again.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Be advised: No. Microphone. Jack.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to start her own Youtube channel. This camera has no jack to put an external microphone in. Really Canon? Not happy...
customer_reviews.author: JD

feature_bullets: 180 Megapixel CMOS (APS C) image sensor and high performance DIGIC 4+ Image Processor for excellent speed and quality
ISO 100 6400 (expandable to H: 12800) for shooting from bright light to low light Compatible with Eye Fi Cards Multimedia cards (MMC) cannot be used
Built in Wi Fi and NFC connectivity provide easy sharing to compatible smart devices, select social media sites and the Canon Connect Station CS100 device
Use the EOS Utility Webcam Beta Software (Mac and Windows) to turn your compatible Canon camera into a high-quality webcam

9 point AF system (including one center cross type AF point) and AI Servo AF provide impressive autofocus performance with accurate results AF Assist Beam Effective range : Approx 131 feet / 40 meter Periphery: Approx 115 feet / 35 meter
